The KubeMQ Installation

Register to KubeMQ

The KubeMQ server is free to use anytime. Registration is needed to obtain the required KubeMQ token. This can be done at Register KubeMQ.

Get KubeMQ

Quick Wizard

Please visit the Get KubeMQ wizard for the quick set up guide.

Manually

KubeMQ is delivered via a small Docker container. The KubeMQ Docker container can be pulled from Docker Hub or by downloading a tar file from GitHub.

Docker Hub:

Run

$ sudo docker pull docker.io/kubemq/kubemq
1

GitHub tar file:

Option 1:

  1. Download kubemq.tar from GitHub
  2. Run
$ sudo docker import kubemq.tar
1

Option 2:

$ sudo docker import https://github.com/kubemq-io/kubemq/releases/[tag:release]
1
